Pre-required tools or databases¶

Tools¶

Python : version higher or equal than 3.4

BioPython: version higher or equal than 1.65

BioPerl: version higher or equal than 1.6.1

Blast+ : version higher or equal than 2.2.28+ (for sRNA_detection)

ImageMagick : version higher or equal than 6.9.0-0 (for generate screenshot)

Infernal : version higher or equal than 1.1.1 (for riboswitch detection)

Matplotlib : version higher or equal than 1.4.3 (for generate all statistics figure)

Networkx : version higher or equal than 1.10 (for generate PPI figure)

MEME : version higher or equal than 4.10.0 (for promoter detection)

PAGIT and RATT : version higher or equal than 1.64 (for annotation transfer) Please be attation, before you start to run RATT(annotation transfer), run source $PAGIT_HOME/sourceme.pagit first. it will modify the path for execute RATT.

Psortb : version higher or equal than 3.0 (for subcellular localization detection)

Samtools : version higher or equal than 1.0 (using htslib 1.0) (for SNP calling, CircRNA_detection)

Bcftools : version higher or equal than 1.0 (using htslib 1.0) (for SNP calling)

Segemehl : version higher or equal than 0.1.9 (for CircRNA_detection)

TranstermHP : version higher or equal than 2.09 (for rho-independent terminator prediction)

TSSpredator : version higher or equal than 1.04 (for TSS and processing site prediction, TSS optimization)

ViennaRNA : version higher or equal than 2.1.7 (for rho-independent terminator prediction, sRNA detection, sRNA_target detection)

Ps2pdf14 (for sRNA detection)

IGV (for screenshot and color_png)

Databases¶

BSRD (for sRNA detection)

nr database (for sRNA detection)

Rfam (for sRNA riboswitch)

idmapping_selected.tab from Uniprot (for Go term detection)

goslim.obo (for Go term detection)

go.obo (for Go term detection)

species.vXXXX.txt from STRING (for protein-protein interaction prediction)
